answers.answer: Hi,I began to develop severe fatigue around 2.5 years ago, just alway's feeling too tired to do anything, getting out of bed was a struggle, I would take naps nearly everyday.After 2.5 years of various testing, such as adrenal fatigue, thyroid etc...  all return normal, I finally was sleep tested June 14, 09,.  I have sleep apnea.Consult with your doctor, and have a sleep study done, or other series of tests to find out why you may be feeling tired all the time.  Have your thyroid & diabetes tested.Fatigue can be a symptom of many different disorders.Are you taking any medications ??  Certain sedative medictions can also make a person feel tired all the time.Good luck to you !!

question: I had a car accident 2 and a half years ago.  i received minor nerve damage to my neck and a snapping scapula which is very painful.  I have Bupranorphine patches to help with this pain.I also have migraines and my last one was about 2 weeks ago and it lasted the usual 3 days but then since then i have had a pressure, dull ache in the same place over the right eye.i don't know if these above have anything to do my present problem, which is i have been having 2 or 3 days at a time when i am totally exhausted and could sleep for 12 hours and still want more.  It is really getting in the way of life because all i want to do is sleep and do not want to go out as i feel so tired.  Its getting me down because i do not want to waste my life sleeping but i seem to want to do that rather than anything else.  please help
